  • Class
    Description
    BooleanParameterKey
    Description/specification of a Boolean configuration parameter.
    CCConfigParameters
    Used to fetch the values of configuration parameters defined in config.xml The list of parameters here is the list of all legal config parameters.
    CCLoggerCategory
    Exposes internal CCLoggerCategory constants to customers.
    CCLoggingMarker
    This is a class for defining logging markers which are used in CC.
    DateParameterKey
    Description/specification of a Date configuration parameter.
    DoubleParameterKey
    Description/specification of a Double configuration parameter.
    EnumParameterKey<E extends Enum<E>>
    Description/specification of an Enum configuration parameter.
    ExternalUserAccessMode
    ExternalUserAccess defines how the system is going to limit, if at all, how users, groups and producer codes can be affiliated with each other.
    IntegerParameterKey
    Description/specification of an Integer configuration parameter.
    ListParameterKey
    Description/specification of a List configuration parameter.
    ObservabilityContextKeys
    MDC keys for observability context updater.
    ParameterKey<T>
    Description/specification of a configuration parameter.
    PLConfigParameters
    Used to fetch the values of configuration parameters defined in config.xml
    PLLoggerCategory
     
    PLLoggingMarker
     
    SetParameterKey
    Description/specification of a Set configuration parameter.
    StringParameterKey
    Description/specification of a String configuration parameter.
    TimeParameterKey
    Description/specification of a Time configuration parameter.
    WarningMode
    WarningMode is on (enable warnings for specified by given parameter), off (disable warnings) or default (unspecified by parameter and left for other determination).
